sentences.english: Today I attended a job fair.
sentences.chinese: 今天我參加了一個招聘會。

sentences.english: Career Fairs are a great way to network face-to-face with local and national employers.
sentences.chinese: 招聘會是和本地及全國的僱主面對面交流的好機會。

sentences.english: Also, you can take part in job fairs.
sentences.chinese: 你還可以參加人才招聘會。

sentences.english: I have to go to the job fair tomorrow.
Yesterday hunted job at BOSCH, met Chen Qiao coincidently.
sentences.chinese: 昨天去BOSCH招聘會，居然碰到陳俏。

sentences.english: The HR Director of TBWA took this Career Fair very seriously.
sentences.chinese: TBWA的人力資源總監對這次招聘會非常的重視。

sentences.english: Help enterprises to introduce qualified personnel and employ workers.
sentences.chinese: 定期舉辦用工招聘會，幫助企業引進人才和招聘工人。

sentences.english: A: I hear that many Hong Kong companies recently held a job fair in Guangdong.
sentences.chinese: 我聽說最近很多香港公司到廣東來舉行招聘會。

sentences.english: They two lost each other on the job fair.
sentences.chinese: 他們兩個在招聘會上走散啦。

sentences.english: Then we invite you to one of the job fares Huisman China attends.
sentences.chinese: 如果是，請您前往豪氏威馬參加的任何一個招聘會。

sentences.english: A few days after the job fair, I caught up with Zhang Hui Li.
sentences.chinese: 這場招聘會過去幾天後，我找到了張慧麗。

sentences.english: Long lines at corporate job hiring fairs illustrate just how many Americans are looking for work.
sentences.chinese: 招聘會上大排長龍，凸顯有多少美國人正在找工作。

sentences.english: The Great Recession forced many colleges to cut back on their job-fairs.
sentences.chinese: 經濟大蕭條迫使許多大學縮短招聘會的時長。

sentences.english: In order to recruit employees, they plan to participate in a local job fair.
sentences.chinese: 爲了招募員工，他們計劃參加一個本地招聘會。
